content: basket-wave hat by erika feller this hat does double-duty one side has a basketweave motif and the other side is awash in waves special thanks to annie maloney annie maloney is a magician with cables she hosts a biennial blanket mkal and one of the background stitches in her starstruck sampler mkal was the basketweave stitch used in this pattern i was intrigued by how lovely the wrong side of the stitch was and annie generously encouraged me to write up this hat pattern �� �� �� �� �� sizes sizes 1 2 3 4 5 with brim circumferences of 14 16 18 20 22 / 35 5 40 5 45 5 51 56 cm to fit
